name: TapioCat Cafe
description: TapioCat is a 2D cooking game. It is focused on time and inventory management. You play as a cat who runs a bubble tea shop. Your goal is to complete as many successful orders as possible in one level. You must serve all customers for the level to end. An unsuccessful delivery (getting a customer’s drink wrong, or taking too long to make it) will result in a score decrease. Your overall score is marked out of 3 stars at the end of each level.
